These foods should  be the main part of 
every meal. Eat wholegrain varieties when 
you	can	as	these	add	extra	fibre	to	our	diet.
Foods high in fat, salt and sugars
This includes products such as 
chocolate, cakes, biscuits, full-sugar 
soft drinks, butter and ice-cream. 
These foods are not needed in the 
diet and so, if included, should only 
be done infrequently and in small 
amounts. If you consume these 
foods and drinks often, try to limit
